title: "High Schooler Invented Low-Cost, Mind-Controlled Prosthetic Arm"
excerpt: "Virginia high school senior Benjamin Choi designed a thought-controlled robotic arm, then three-dimensionally (3D) printed the first model in small pieces, and assembled it with bolts and rubber bands. That model responded to brain wave data and head gestures."
